verbs.description: rolladen hurricane shutter company [V: must] refund customers 790 000 florida says rolladen inc a longtime hurricane shutter company based in hallandale beach must offer complete refunds to consumers totaling 790 000 in a settlement reached with state regulators over economic crimes unit rolladen windows hallandale beach florida local law enforcement robert hoffman palm beach county broward sheriffs office pam bondi
